name: Luck Battle
description:
Luck Battle is a 3D strategy-simulation game prototype with 1 v 1 combat.

How To Play:

  • Each player takes turns to setup their armies before battle.
  • Players can take 3 kinds of actions during setup:
    • Roll the dice to spawn a battalion.
    • Click the heart to increase spawned battalion's health.
    • Click the size option (square) to increase battalion's height <The Knights mount horses>. 

Each action costs coins and players can take any number of actions, wallet permitting!

  • Click 'Battle' to begin each round and click 'End Turn' to mark end of each player's turn.
  • Three (3) rounds complete a game.  

This mini-game is a sure-shot conversation starter. Bookmark now and access anywhere anytime.

Creators: Harshit Arora, Dhruv Kapoor & Rahul Kr Singh

This prototype was made within 48 hours.
Hope you enjoy it!
